New Records: Kyle Hendricks pitched 7 1/3 scoreless innings in the Cubs' 3-0 win against the Reds, setting a new record for his scoreless innings in a game
Key Match Events: Kyle Hendricks' emotional exit as he was taken out of the game, with 'Sweet Emotion' playing and a heartfelt comment about feeling all the emotions
Post-Match Reflections: Kyle Hendricks expressed feeling lucky and happy after the game, reflecting on his emotions and the significance of the moment
Miscellaneous Highlights: The song 'Sweet Emotion' played as Hendricks was taken out, evoking nostalgia and emotional reactions from fans
